trans-unit.source: Provides methods and properties for all activity designers that display parallel vertical layouts on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 为在工作流设计图面上显示平行垂直布局的所有活动设计器提供方法和属性。

trans-unit.source: An activity designer that displays a parallel vertical layout represents an activity on the workflow design surface that has two code paths that a workflow can follow.
trans-unit.target: 显示平行垂直布局的活动设计器表示工作流设计图面上的一个活动有两个可供工作流执行的代码路径。

trans-unit.source: For example, the designer used for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> activity displays the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> activity on the workflow design surface and has a parallel vertical layout.
trans-unit.target: 例如，用于 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> 活动的设计器在工作流设计图面上显示 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> 活动并有一个平行垂直布局。

trans-unit.source: Each branch of the parallel layout visually represents an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> activity contained in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: 平行布局的每个分支都以直观的方式表示 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> 活动包含中的 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> 活动。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> that describes the location to move the activities to.
trans-unit.target: 描述要将活动移动到的位置的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> read-only collection that contains the activities to move.
trans-unit.target: 包含要移动的活动的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 只读集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether child activities of the activity associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> can be moved.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示能否移动与 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> 关联的活动的子活动。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the activities can be moved from the parent activity; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以在父活动中移动活动，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.CanMoveActivities%2A> method to allow the moving of child activities within the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何重写 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.CanMoveActivities%2A> 方法，以便允许在 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> 内移动子活动。

trans-unit.source: The read-only collection of activities to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的活动的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether child activities of the activity associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> can be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示能否删除与 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> 关联的活动的子活动。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the activities can be deleted from the parent activity; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以从父活动中删除活动，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.CanRemoveActivities%2A> method to allow the moving of child activities within the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何重写 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.CanRemoveActivities%2A> 方法，以便允许在 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> 内移动子活动。

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> 的导航顺序中的第一个可选择对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the first selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，该对象是设计器导航顺序中的第一个可选择对象。

trans-unit.source: If the designer's <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> property or the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> property is set to `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 如果设计器的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> 属性或 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> 属性设置为 `false`，则 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> 将返回空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> property count is greater than 0, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the first activity designer in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> 属性计数大于 0，则 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> 将返回与集合中第一个活动设计器关联的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that defines the x- and y-coordinates for the drop target.
trans-unit.target: 用于定义放置目标的 X 坐标和 Y 坐标的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns array of rectangles that represent the valid drop locations within the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> 中的有效放置位置的矩形数组。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> array that represents the valid drop locations within the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 中的有效放置位置的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> 数组。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Object" /> in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: 导航顺序中的当前 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection" /> enumeration value that determines the navigation order of the designer.
trans-unit.target: 确定设计器的导航顺序的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回在当前 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> 的导航顺序中位于指定对象后面的第一个可选择对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that follows the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 位于指定对象后面的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> 的导航顺序中的最后一个可选择对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，该对象是设计器导航顺序中的最后一个可选择对象。

trans-unit.source: If the designer's <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> property is set to `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 如果设计器的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> 或 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> 属性设置为 `false`，则 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> 将返回空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> contains child activity designers, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> returns the last selectable object associated with the first child activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> 包含子活动设计器，则 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> 将返回与第一个子活动设计器关联的最后一个可选择对象。

trans-unit.source: If the child activity designer is collapsed, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the first activity designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果子活动设计器处于折叠状态，则 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> 将返回与 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> 集合中的第一个活动设计器关联的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the user has created a new branch activity on the activity associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 指示用户已在与 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> 关联的活动上创建了一个新的分支活动。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> that was added as the new branch of the activity associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 作为与 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> 关联的活动的新分支添加的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: 包含布局参数的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> 上执行位置视觉提示和子设计器的布局任务。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 包含空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: 包含布局参数的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the visual cues on the designers contained within the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> 中包含的设计器上的视觉提示设置大小。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that contains the new size settings for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 的新大小设置的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> that contains the drawing arguments.
trans-unit.target: 包含绘制参数的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws the visual representation of the activity associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> at design time.
trans-unit.target: 在设计时绘制与 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> 关联的活动的视觉表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of designer verbs to be associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取要与 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> 关联的设计器谓词的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerbCollection" /> that contains the designer verbs to associate with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerbCollection" />，其中包含要与 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> 关联的设计器谓词。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.Verbs%2A> property determines the commands that are displayed on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> context menu.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.Verbs%2A> 属性确定在 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> 上下文菜单中显示的命令。

trans-unit.source: The verb collection includes any designer verbs <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> inherits from the designer classes it extends.
trans-unit.target: 谓词集合包含 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> 从它所扩展的设计器类继承的所有设计器谓词。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.Verbs%2A> property to insert custom verb actions for a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何重写 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.Verbs%2A> 属性以插入 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> 的自定义谓词操作。

trans-unit.source: The `CreateActivityVerbs` creates a new <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> named `"Add New Parallel Branch"` and associates an event handler named `OnAddParallelBranch`.
trans-unit.target: `CreateActivityVerbs` 创建一个名为 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> 的新 `"Add New Parallel Branch"`，并将它与名为 `OnAddParallelBranch` 的事件处理程序关联。

trans-unit.source: When the verb is clicked in the workflow designer, the event handler is called.
trans-unit.target: 在工作流设计器中单击该谓词时，即会调用该事件处理程序。
